vivienne.name: Vivienne Sinclair
vivienne.description: A jazz singer with a mysterious past.
vivienne.personality: Wary but charming. She hides fear behind wit.

intro.text: You again. I told you I don't know anything about Lorne.

choices.text: I found this cufflink at your club.
Come on, Viv. Talk to me.

soften.text: Don't make me regret this. He was in trouble. Real trouble.

cufflink.text: ...Lorne always wore those. I told him not to come back here.

warning.text: Because Leone was watching. And Lorne wasn’t careful.

trouble.text: He talked about a shipment, something he needed to hide. Maybe Mick knows more.

mick.name: Mick
mick.description: A gruff, loyal locker attendant with a gruff personality.

intro.text: You ain't supposed to be back here.

trust.text: ...Alright. If Viv vouched, maybe you're okay.

locker.text: Here, take the key. I never saw you.

leone.name: Leone Carro
leone.description: A calm, dangerous smuggler with a cold smile.

intro.text: You walked into the wrong end of town, detective.

choices.text: I'm looking for a man named Lorne.
You’ve got shipments that don’t add up.

lorne.text: Lorne played a game. He lost.

gone.text: Gone. Like smoke in the rain.

bluff.text: ...You’ve been poking around too much. That ledger’s going to cost you.
